content.raw: I've seen this bug as well, but the steps are slighting different from what you describe. To reproduce it, make sure that in step 2 the whole model is selected (one bounding box around all of the parts). Then ctrl-click an individual object and press delete. It will delete the entire model (probably because it thinks the entire model is selected).
content.html: I've seen this bug as well, but the steps are slighting different from what you describe. To reproduce it, make sure that in step 2 the whole model is selected (one bounding box around all of the parts). Then ctrl-click an individual object and press delete. It will delete the entire model (probably because it thinks the entire model is selected).
